title: Inflation rate in South Sudan 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
Inflation rate compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2024.
The line significantly increased by 327.04 from Year 2015 to 2016, and lastly, decreased by 59.02 from Year 2018 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 379.85 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 7.95 was reported at Year 2024
